snippet.title: Camp Buddy: Scoutmaster Season - 'Buddy Oath' (Official Opening Video)
snippet.description:
#CampBuddy #ScoutmasterSeason #BuddyOath #BLits

BLits Games debuts its second project: BL / Gay Visual Novel - 'Camp Buddy: Scoutmaster Season' ! Following the events of BLits' debut title, Camp Buddy, Scoutmaster Season follows the game's lead scoutmaster, Yoshinori Nagira as he and his fellow scoutmasters undergo an exciting expansion project, reconnect with old acquaintances, and find romance with Aiden Flynn, the camp's happy-go-lucky lead chef, or Goro Nomoru, the stern but caring camp president. Forever it's our Buddy Oath!

RELEASE DATE:
March 31, 2022

VIDEO CREDITS:
Theme Song Title: ' Buddy Oath '
Composed by: HMNK
Guitars by MYM
Vocals by: KENO
Mixing by: KENO & Kevpho
Lyrics by: Zael, KENO, Mikkoukun
Opening Video Animation by: Saur & MicMan

-------------------------------------------------
IMPORTANT DISCLAIMER: The story, persons, places, characters, and events presented in Camp Buddy: Scoutmaster Season and are purely fictional and not intended to depict real persons, places, characters, and events. Any correlation with natural persons (living or deceased), places, characters, and events are entirely coincidental.   Said fictional characters depicted in this project and all BLits Games' characters are not under the age of eighteen (18) years old.  All relevant information concerning the characters can be found on their respective individual profiles on our website.
